alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 4:40PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT PARTS OF EASTERN WINDHAM...WESTERN WINDHAM...AND BENNINGTON COUNTIES... HAZARDS...Snow showers with moderate to locally heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 439 PM EST, snow showers were over Shaftsbury, or near Arlington moving southeast at 20 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED... The snow shower will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Eastern Windham, southern Western Windham and central Bennington Counties. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through the snow showers. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
